message: Let's divide fairly, I get a bit more
Come on, I'm being reasonable, don't let inflation eat your share
This is my final offer, take it or leave it. It's better than letting inflation eat away at both our shares.
Don't bluff, I know you're losing value each round
Let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest option. Take it before inflation hurts us both.
Your 50/50 offer is generous, but I'll take a bit more, considering inflation is only hurting you
